text: Edgar Streltsov (; born 14 September 1977) is a former Russian football player. He currently lives in Switzerland and works for FIFA. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Metallurg Lipetsk players Category:FC Rostov players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Switzerland Category:FC Lausanne-Sport players Category:FC Stade Nyonnais players Category:Association football forwards
title: Edgar Streltsov
